description.value: Using a mixture of dinosaur bones and the bones of your ancestors to focus your magic, you animate lizards and dinosaurs to carry messages or serve as mounts. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Animal Messenger]{Animal Messenger} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Phantom Steed]{Phantom Steed} as primal innate spells once per day each. The animal messenger is always a Tiny dinosaur or lizard, and your innate spell transforms it from bones to flesh, even if there are no dinosaurs or lizards nearby. The phantom steed looks like a dinosaur rather than a horse but functions identically.
